channel.title: Music – 성훈(Brown Eyed Soul)
channel.description: Recent content in 성훈(Brown Eyed Soul) on Music

item.title: 성훈(Brown Eyed Soul) - So Goodbye
item.description:

사무치는
생각 없는 너의 말

item.title: 성훈(Brown Eyed Soul) - Fail In Love(Feat. E-Sens Of Supreme Team)
